shouldGzip

public boolean shouldGzip(java.lang.String contentType)

Checks for inclusion in the gzipList field. Allows basic wild cards.

An empty or null field defaults to gzipping of all content types.

Parameters:
contentType -
Returns:

parseRanges

public static boolean parseRanges(BasicFileServlet.FileRequestContext context)
Parses the Range Header of the request and sets the appropriate ranges list on the BasicFileServlet.FileRequestContext Object.

Parameters:
context -
Returns:
false if the range pattern contains no satisfiable ranges.

canAccept

public static boolean canAccept(java.lang.String headerValue,
                                boolean strict,
                                java.lang.String type)
Parses an Accept header value and checks to see if the type is acceptable.

Parameters:
headerValue - The value of the header.
strict - Forces the type to be in the header.
type - The token that we need in order to be acceptable.
